title: Drawing, Design for a Six-Legged Rectangular Dining Table of Mahogany, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for a Six-Legged Rectangular Dining Table of Mahogany
medium: Pen and black ink on thin, cream paper
markings: Partial watermark across verso bottom : ORIENTAL LINEN
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink, upper right corner of image with arrow pointing to table top: Top 4.6" x 6'.0" to extend 12' "; in lower left quadrant of sheet: Dining Table / of Mahogany
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Rectangular molded table top with dividing stretcher center on 6 tapering fluted legs on casters with flute-stops; legs carved at tops.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for a Six-Legged Rectangular Dining Table of Mahogany, 1900–05. Pen and black ink on thin, cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-125.
